snippet.title: Persona 2: Innocent Sin (PSP) | Opening Movie | Persona 25th
snippet.description:
Persona 2: Innocent Sin was remade for PlayStation Portable in 2011! 

We'll be uploading Persona openings each week - stay tuned for more, and let us know in the comments what your favorite Persona title is! 

Follow us:
Twitter: https://bit.ly/AtlusTW
Instagram: https://bit.ly/AtlusIG
Facebook: https://bit.ly/AtlusFB

Stay up to date on the Persona 25th festivities: https://atlus.com/persona25th/
